meanings.definition: The point in an orbit farthest from the body being orbited.
meanings.sent1: The spaceship reached its apoapses and started its journey back towards Earth.
meanings.sent2: The rocket's trajectory took it to the apoapses before looping back around.
meanings.sent3: At the apoapses, the astronaut waved goodbye to the distant planet.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams soared to the apoapses of success, reaching new heights.
meanings.sent5: The apoapses of the orbit offered a breathtaking view of the galaxy.
